content: this pattern is also available for free on my blog 1 all over texture of the sage dishcloth makes it a great modern kitchen decor accent using only knit and purl stitches it s a delight to knit for beginners and beyond this pattern has been tech edited and test knit **sizes** one size - width 18 cm 7 length 18 cm 7 **materials** **yarn ** 40 m 45 yds of paris drops - 100% cotton 75 m 82 yds per 50g or similar worsted / aran weight category 4 - medium yarn sample worked in colorway 63 desert rose **needles ** 5 mm us 8 straight or circular needles or to fit gauge **other ** tapestry needle row counter recommended not required **gauge** 18 stitches x 28 row in 10x10 cm 4x4 in garter stitch blocked 1 https //whileberry com/blog/sage-dishcloth-free-knitting-pattern
